entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: single_query #51531
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plaintext, plaintext #51530
  • Deprecate support for manual chunking #51529
  • Cannot deserialize into `google.protobuf.NullValue` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51521
  • Support `google.type.Decimal` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51520
  • In Blazor WebApp with auto render mode, how to resolve the pages or routeData from wasm? #51518
  • DotNetDispatcher.cs(391,67): error IL2111: Method 'ScanTypeForCallableMethods(Type)' with parameters or return value with `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute` is accessed via reflection #51517
  • JsonPath for private properties #51514
  • blazor wasm project deployed with error when config `PublishTrimmed true` and `TrimMode link` #51513
  • In Dmain Driven Design (DDD) , Should be use the IRepository contract in the application layer or in the domain layer? #51511
  • Enable using the Blazor WebAssembly loading progress indicator in a Blazor Web App #51510
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor wasm hosted in a subfolder doesn't hot reload on changing #44568
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #51485
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextSansFilter #51515
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when using RenderModeAuto in .NET 8 RC1 #51236
    8.0.0
  • Using SupplyParameterFromQuery on arrays, Blazor Wasm triggers too many on OnParametersSet #51351
  • Add async support to form validation with EditContext on submit #51501
  • RC2 Blazor Web App template nits and inconsistencies #51495
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51469
  • Perf regression: single_query #51487
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #51504
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51505
  • Blazor AuthorizeView in latest .Net8.rc-2 Blazor-Web-App template not working reliably #51368
    8.0.0
  • Crash issue with SignalR-Client-CPP ， Help me #48139
  • Signalr: Request for Optimized Client-Server Communication #48239

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Add table to README with links to nightly builds #51534
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #51532
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for .NET 8 #51527
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency from dotnet-sql-cache #51524
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove duplicate .sln from Blazor Web Template WebAssembly and Auto #51494
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Add retries to the node install script #51525
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51456
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2dd1c13` to `116b7e5` #51523
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51498
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix Blazor template bug where a logged in user could appear to be unauthenticated #51497
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve MultipartReader performance #51426
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Blazor web template cleanup #51337
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, area-security
